description: Socket read/write operation timed out. Server didn't respond within configured timeout period.
prevention: Use progress indicators for long requests
examples: val client = OkHttpClient.Builder().connectTimeout(30, SECONDS).readTimeout(60, SECONDS).writeTimeout(60, SECONDS).build()
try { api.download() } catch (e: SocketTimeoutException) { showTimeoutError(); retry() }
suspend fun <T> withTimeout(timeout: Long, block: suspend () -> T) = withTimeout(timeout) { block() }
